response.overview: When life catches up with you, you suddenly realise how long you’ve been standing at the cliff edge, just waiting to fall.  Cliff Edge was written as a monologue to show the reality of growing up with chronic pain. As a young person growing up that way, you feel your constantly on edge, struggling to find the balance of life. This film is to show the challenges through my eyes as a teen hoping to find my way, even with all the extra weight I carry.
response.tagline: When life catches up with you, you suddenly realise how long you’ve been standing at the cliff edge, just waiting to fall.
response.title: Cliff Edge
